Name: Disable-NetAdapter
Synopsis: Disables a network adapter.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterBinding
Synopsis: Disables a binding to a network adapter.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterChecksumOffload
Synopsis: Disables the selected checksum offloads on the network adapter.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterEncapsulatedPacketTaskOffload
Synopsis: Disables encapsulated packet task offload.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterIPsecOffload
Synopsis: Disables IPsec offload on the network adapter, so that the network adapter will not perform the per packet encryption operations.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterLso
Synopsis: Disables all LSO properties, such as LSOv4 and LSOv6, of the network adapter.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterPacketDirect
Synopsis:
Disable-NetAdapterPacketDirect [-Name] <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Disable-NetAdapterPacketDirect -InterfaceDescription <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Disable-NetAdapterPacketDirect -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_NetAdapterPacketDirectSettingData[]> [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Disable-NetAdapterPowerManagement
Synopsis: Disables specific power management features on a network adapter.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterQos
Synopsis: Disables QoS on a network adapter.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterRdma
Synopsis: Disables RDMA on a network adapter.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterRsc
Synopsis: Disables RSC on a network adapter.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterRss
Synopsis: Disables RSS on a network adapter.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterSriov
Synopsis: Disables SR-IOV on a network adapter.

Name: Disable-NetAdapterUso
Synopsis:
Disable-NetAdapterUso [-Name] <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-IPv4] [-IPv6] [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Disable-NetAdapterUso -InterfaceDescription <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-IPv4] [-IPv6] [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Disable-NetAdapterUso -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_NetAdapterUsoSettingData[]> [-IPv4] [-IPv6] [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Disable-NetAdapterVmq
Synopsis: Disables the VMQ feature on a network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapter
Synopsis: Enables a network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterBinding
Synopsis: Enables binding of a protocol or filter to a network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterChecksumOffload
Synopsis: Enables checksum offloads on the network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterEncapsulatedPacketTaskOffload
Synopsis: Enables encapsulated packet task offload.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterIPsecOffload
Synopsis: Enables IPsec offload on the network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterLso
Synopsis: Enables LSO properties, such as LSOv4 and LSOv6, of the network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterPacketDirect
Synopsis:
Enable-NetAdapterPacketDirect [-Name] <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Enable-NetAdapterPacketDirect -InterfaceDescription <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Enable-NetAdapterPacketDirect -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_NetAdapterPacketDirectSettingData[]> [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Enable-NetAdapterPowerManagement
Synopsis: Enables specific power management features on the network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterQos
Synopsis: Enables QoS on the network adapter, specifically DCB.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterRdma
Synopsis: Enables RDMA on a network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterRsc
Synopsis: Enables RSC on a network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterRss
Synopsis: Enables RSS on a network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterSriov
Synopsis: Enables SR-IOV on a network adapter.

Name: Enable-NetAdapterUso
Synopsis:
Enable-NetAdapterUso [-Name] <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-IPv4] [-IPv6] [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Enable-NetAdapterUso -InterfaceDescription <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-IPv4] [-IPv6] [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Enable-NetAdapterUso -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_NetAdapterUsoSettingData[]> [-IPv4] [-IPv6] [-NoRestart] [-PassThru] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Enable-NetAdapterVmq
Synopsis: Enables VMQ on a network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapter
Synopsis: Gets the basic network adapter properties.

Name: Get-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty
Synopsis: Gets the advanced properties for a network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterBinding
Synopsis: Gets a list of bindings for a network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterChecksumOffload
Synopsis: Gets the various checksum offload settings from network adapters that support these checksum offloads.

Name: Get-NetAdapterEncapsulatedPacketTaskOffload
Synopsis: Gets the network adapters that support encapsulated task offload.

Name: Get-NetAdapterHardwareInfo
Synopsis: Gets the hardware information of the network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterIPsecOffload
Synopsis: Gets the IPsec offload properties of the network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterLso
Synopsis: Gets the LSO properties of the network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterPacketDirect
Synopsis:
Get-NetAdapterPacketDirect [[-Name] <string[]>] [-IncludeHidden] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-NetAdapterPacketDirect -InterfaceDescription <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-NetAdapterPowerManagement
Synopsis: Gets the power management features of a network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterQos
Synopsis: Gets the QoS properties of the network adapter, specifically DCB settings.

Name: Get-NetAdapterRdma
Synopsis: Gets the RDMA properties for a network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterRsc
Synopsis: Gets network adapters that support RSC.

Name: Get-NetAdapterRss
Synopsis: Gets RSS properties of the network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterSriov
Synopsis: Gets the SR-IOV properties of the network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterSriovVf
Synopsis: Displays the SR-IOV virtual function settings for a network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterStatistics
Synopsis: Gets statistics from a network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterUso
Synopsis:
Get-NetAdapterUso [[-Name] <string[]>] [-IncludeHidden] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Get-NetAdapterUso -InterfaceDescription <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Get-NetAdapterVmq
Synopsis: Gets the VMQ properties of a network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterVMQQueue
Synopsis: Gets the VMQs allocated on a network adapter.

Name: Get-NetAdapterVPort
Synopsis: Displays the network adapter VPort settings for a SR-IOV or VMQ VPort.

Name: New-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty
Synopsis: Creates an advanced property for the network adapter.

Name: Remove-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty
Synopsis: Removes an advanced property from the network adapter.

Name: Rename-NetAdapter
Synopsis: Renames a network adapter.

Name: Reset-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty
Synopsis: Resets the advanced properties of a network adapter to their factory default values.

Name: Restart-NetAdapter
Synopsis: Restarts a network adapter by disabling and then re-enabling the network adapter.

Name: Set-NetAdapter
Synopsis: Sets the basic network adapter properties.

Name: Set-NetAdapterAdvancedProperty
Synopsis: Sets the advanced properties of a network adapter.

Name: Set-NetAdapterBinding
Synopsis: Sets the binding state of a transport or filter on a network adapter.

Name: Set-NetAdapterChecksumOffload
Synopsis: Sets the various checksum offload settings.

Name: Set-NetAdapterEncapsulatedPacketTaskOffload
Synopsis: Sets the encapsulated packet task offload property of the network adapter.

Name: Set-NetAdapterIPsecOffload
Synopsis: Sets the IPsec offload properties of a network adapter.

Name: Set-NetAdapterLso
Synopsis: Sets the LSO properties of a network adapter.

Name: Set-NetAdapterPacketDirect
Synopsis:
Set-NetAdapterPacketDirect [-Name] <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-Enabled <bool>] [-DomainId <uint32>] [-NoRestart] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-NetAdapterPacketDirect -InterfaceDescription <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-Enabled <bool>] [-DomainId <uint32>] [-NoRestart] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-NetAdapterPacketDirect -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_NetAdapterPacketDirectSettingData[]> [-Enabled <bool>] [-DomainId <uint32>] [-NoRestart] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Set-NetAdapterPowerManagement
Synopsis: Sets the power management properties on the network adapter.

Name: Set-NetAdapterQos
Synopsis: Sets QoS properties on a network adapter.

Name: Set-NetAdapterRdma
Synopsis: Sets the RDMA properties on the network adapter.

Name: Set-NetAdapterRsc
Synopsis: Sets the enabled state of RSC.

Name: Set-NetAdapterRss
Synopsis: Sets the RSS properties on a network adapter.

Name: Set-NetAdapterSriov
Synopsis: Sets the SR-IOV properties of the network adapter, such as the number of virtual functions, the number of VPorts, and the number of queue pairs for default and non-default VPorts.

Name: Set-NetAdapterUso
Synopsis:
Set-NetAdapterUso [-Name] <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-IPv4Enabled <bool>] [-IPv6Enabled <bool>] [-NoRestart] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-NetAdapterUso -InterfaceDescription <string[]> [-IncludeHidden] [-IPv4Enabled <bool>] [-IPv6Enabled <bool>] [-NoRestart] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Set-NetAdapterUso -InputObject <CimInstance#MSFT_NetAdapterUsoSettingData[]> [-IPv4Enabled <bool>] [-IPv6Enabled <bool>] [-NoRestart] [-CimSession <CimSession[]>] [-ThrottleLimit <int>] [-AsJob] [-PassThru] [-WhatIf] [-Confirm] [<CommonParameters>]

Name: Set-NetAdapterVmq
Synopsis: Sets the VMQ properties of a network adapter.
